name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Tech Lead with 8 years of experience in backend and frontend development, specializing in building scalable internal tools and improving workflows. Proficient in developing robust authorization systems utilizing **RBAC**, **ABAC**, and **ReBAC** methodologies to enhance security. Experienced in full-stack development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, ensuring efficient collaboration and clear system documentation across remote teams.
My expertise in cloud platforms such as **Azure** and **AWS** complements my skills in building high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. I have led the development of comprehensive enterprise-grade applications that integrate AI/ML for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, all while adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I bring a solid foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, driving continuous improvement and fostering effective communication within cross-functional teams.
